code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{addDoc,collection}from"firebase/firestore";import{db}from'../firebaseconfig';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TaskForm(){const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await addDoc(collection(db,"tasks"),{title,dueDate,description,status:'pending'});setTitle('');setDueDate('');setDescription('');}catch(err){console.error("Error adding task: ",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"task-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"Task Title",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:dueDate,onChange:e=>setDueDate(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),placeholder:"Task Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});}export default TaskForm;
